title: When you are a Support, and your ADC actually says GJ when you get them fed

replies.body:
When the ADC trash talks the support, this is what I hear
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/enhanced/webdr06/2013/7/3/10/anigif_enhanced-buzz-5928-1372863158-6.gif
i left some adcs who blame me and started going top,mid or with jungler to gank

Now this good in an actual situation but one time I went ADC Kennen

My support disliked this so he went top with Fiora and KSed her everytime

as you can assume it was a Blitzcrank
Some of the most satisfying moments are when your adc is trash talking you so you leave them and go mid only to IMMEDIATELY secure a kill for mid. *air jerk off motion*
Logged in to +1 this post {{champion:53}}

When I adc, I thank the support if they save my life or if we get through a good fight alive.

I never adc though, so it's irrelevant.
I always thank my support when I am ADC, as I am the worst ADC in NA. If I win, it is not because of my skill.
No wayyy, you can be second though... I'm number one worst ADC in NA lol
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1991048945/217750770?tab=overview
That's my favorite build on Kali!!
Best. Build. Ever.
I will tell you one thing, I gained some more respect for good Kali players after using her. She looks freelo, but she is actually quite difficult.
i have to practice more her jumps and when to use her e, i lost so many kills for not knowing when to use it correctly
The key is just keep stacking rend. But don't use it, as you always could get *one* more stack.
Same, I put Kalista in a box after i bought her.  Now it's Draaaaaaaaaaaaven free week and i find him easier than she is.

draaven sure is strong and if you correctly catch his axe you'll do great, the problem with him is that he's easy to counter, since the enemy can see where your axe is going to fall, they can time they're skill shot to hit you quite easily
they cant counter you if they are dead....
But that's atleast 254 more cs than I would have had!

When I adc I go 0/12 with 60 cs and steal dragon once.

No, really.

Don't feel bad, buddy of mine had 25 cs at the 25 minute mark as draven.

i was impressed

on a side note, Fish really isn't that bad of an adc, i've actually won every game where he was my adc.
Well thank you. I have been practicing ADC so I wouldn't be so bad. As long as I stay ahead I do fine, but if I fall behind even slightly I tend to get scores like 5/14
Wildturtle, is that you?
No.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=68ugkg9RePc

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1OPi94wi,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-04T19:23:18.107+0000)
>
> I always thank my support when I am ADC, as I am the worst ADC in NA. If I win, it is not because of my skill.

I do too.
Unless I'm playing {{champion:119}} 
Because Draven only needs Dravveeennn

When your ADC calls you a bad support when they are down 100 cs.

And you're using your relic shield efficiently.

https://media.giphy.com/media/13KbizKBgz2llS/giphy.gif

Gotta love that.

"Report Taric for KSing my CS!!"

Taric's first item: {{item:3302}} 

http://i.imgur.com/SCe25.jpg
It IS possible to accidentally CS even with that if you misjudge how many charges you have active. I've done that before.

Yes....
Oh My God yes....
I love it when at the end of the game my ADC says "Dude you're a great support, Thanks for feeding me"
It makes me feel..
Outrageous{{champion:44}}
In my personal experience its the supports who are abusive to the adc's...idk thats just from my games though xD

That is a fair point. Increasingly I have seen the blame falling to the ADC instead of the support or jungler. Anytime we stop people from blaming one position, they just start flaming the next. 
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/funny-world-we-live-in.gif
I find its often more than one persons fault for not only poor performance but just a bad team atmosphere in general putting everyone else on tilt  :/

Those aren't supports. 
Those are probably last pick.
Now that I think of it a fair amount of them were your typical " pantheon support " or "urgot support".. lol

This is how I usually react.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1zdn7FvhQFQ/maxresdefault.jpg

PRAISE THE SUN!

every league of legends player should listen to solaire and join the sunbro's
{{champion:67}} _All me_

I love my supports, they put up with my shitty decision making and mistakes. I tend to make supports lives stressful without meaning to, so i try to make sure they know i love them when they carry me.
{{champion:33}}: Ok.
Possibly one of the best FEK avatars.

One of the pains of having bad teammates for me is when they complain about peeling. Whenever I try to peel they run away and whenever i'm backing out they want me to peel.

Recently on the PBE I had a Caitlyn who ran into the enemy jungle, got caught out and died then raged saying that we needed to protect her she's a god if she is well protected. 

I've seen some players with bloated egos but non literally referred to themselves as a god as much as this Caitlyn did. Our yi wasn't to far behind her in the god complex. He was also raging about us not peeling but the obvious problem came up when the support and mid both realized they wanted us to just die for them and left.

and then that feel when you get your {{champion:67}} fed at 7-0-1, Bot and Mid outer towers and Dragon to end lane.....and they end the game at 7-19-12
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
PSA: Support your Support!
I just end up flirting with the ADC most of the time and make them doubt their sexuality afterwards... It's always an odd game whenever Nautilus is around {{champion:111}}
